messages.subject: Tsuba for Sale
messages.msgSnippet: All, I have listed 3 very nice tsuba for sale, they are currently residing in Japan. Please contact me with any questions or interest in purchasing.
messages.messageBody:
All, I have listed 3 very nice tsuba for sale, they are currently
residing in Japan. Please contact me with any questions or interest in
purchasing.

http://members.westnet.com.au/whiz/richard/sale/sale_tsuba.htm

cheers

Rich Turner

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Help with signature please
messages.msgSnippet: hi mark, that would be great - please do. Thanks, Louis Mark P. Jones  wrote: Louis There is an example in Tomei Soran and it does not seem
messages.messageBody:
hi mark, that would be great - please do.

Thanks,
Louis

"Mark P. Jones" <nixe@...> wrote:
Louis

There is an example in Tomei Soran and it does not seem to match, quite a
bit different. I could email you a picture of the oshigata if you do not
have that book

Mark P. Jones
nixe@...

messages.subject: Help with signature please
messages.msgSnippet: Hello There, I am trying to figure out if this signature is correct, the only reference I have for it is in Fujishiro and it looks off . Any help would be
messages.messageBody:
Hello There,

I am trying to figure out if this signature is correct, the only
reference I have for it is in Fujishiro and it looks "off".

Any help would be appreciated.

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/ebay/biz.jpg

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/ebay/biz1.jpg

Regards,
Louis Skebo
